results.abstract: Invasive species can damage the ecosystems they wind up in. But in parts of the world, endangered predators make hearty meals out of them.

results.title: What Liz Cheney’s Lopsided Loss Says About the State of the G.O.P.
results.abstract: She hoped Jan. 6 would be a turning point for Republicans. And while it did prove to be a dividing line, it was those who crossed Donald J. Trump who have faced electoral consequences.

results.title: Lawyer Who Defeated Cheney Spent Career Fighting Environmental Rules
results.abstract: Harriet Hageman, who challenged Representative Liz Cheney, worked for decades as a lawyer opposing environmentalists and federal regulations of resources in Wyoming.

media.caption: Harriet Hageman this year at a “Save America” rally in Casper. She has a track record in Wyoming of strong advocacy on issues relevant to ranchers, energy and mining interests.

results.adx_keywords: Forgery;Manuscripts;Solar System;Jupiter (Planet);Libraries and Librarians;Colleges and Universities;Galilei, Galileo;Wilding, Nick (Historian);Alvarez, Pablo (Curator);Nicotra, Tobia;University of Michigan;Morgan Library & Museum
results.title: A Watermark, and ‘Spidey Sense,’ Unmask a Forged Galileo Treasure
results.abstract: One of the University of Michigan Library’s most prized possessions, which appeared to be a Galileo manuscript, is now thought to be the work of a 20th-century forger.

media.caption: The manuscript showed the draft of a letter at the top, and sketches plotting the positions of the moons Galileo discovered around Jupiter — which the university had believed were “the first observational data that showed objects orbiting a body other than the earth.”

results.title: F.B.I. Interviewed Top White House Lawyers About Missing Trump Documents
results.abstract: Pat A. Cipollone and Patrick F. Philbin are the most senior former Trump aides known to have been interviewed in the investigation into his handling of classified material.

media.caption: Patrick F. Philbin, the former deputy White House counsel, is among eight people who work or used to work for President Donald J. Trump who have been contacted by the F.B.I. since a grand jury was formed this year.
